content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 1, Leicester City 1.

Offside, Chelsea. Ruben Loftus-Cheek tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.

Substitution, Leicester City. Marc Albrighton replaces Riyad Mahrez.

Goal!  Chelsea 1, Leicester City 0. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
